updates.message: New patch for the game and renewed interest in updating the tools here. Sorry it took so long. I've added a download and upload feature to the Outpost Calculator. Now that Melee weapons have tiers and crafting I'll be taking another look at finishing the Weapon Mod Calculator again.
Outpost Calculator v1.0 is live. I will be adding more features to it in the future.

message.1: Item ID tables are mostly finished. I haven't included weapons yet because I have not figured out how to properly work with the tiered weapons in the console yet. I will be adding them soon.
message.2: I will be introducing new tools soon. Outpost building and Weapon Modification calculators are next. First iteration of Weapon Mod calculator will be a simple calculator that will tell you base modification values. I'll add in skill modifiers later on.
